title: Beach Culture
content:
I read a recent article talking about David Cason’s work on Beach Culture mag. I only saw a few screens of the work, but the stuff is amazing and suprisingly, i hadnt heard a lot about the work he did with the magazine. I always heard Ray Gun this and that but not so much about BC…So i was wondering if anyone had some good links to screens of pages or to places you can find actual copies? i’ve really never seen this magazine anywhere and the usual ebay search didnt turn up anything. So before i email D. Carson himself, i thought i’d ask here. thanks

w|m
author: Will Miller

comments.content:
There are layouts from Beach Culture in End of Print, iirc.  
I will check, unless someone else has a copy handy.

Since you’re in or around Chicago, try the Washington Library. I know they have issues of Ray Gun. Maybe you already tried that, but I thought I’d suggest it anyway. Don’t let the owls scare you off.

Nice weather today, eh?
